fields.original_string: public static final String ECDSA_PUBLIC_KEY_TYPE_URL = new EcdsaVerifyKeyManager().getKeyType();

public static final String RSA_PKCS1_PUBLIC_KEY_TYPE_URL =
      new RsaSsaPkcs1VerifyKeyManager().getKeyType();
